name: CPS - Archival Object - Collab with Celeste
name_original: CPS - Archival Object - Collab with Celeste
description: I collabed with  Yuchan Cao (Celeste) to work on their Character, Place and Simulation Archival Object. It's a jukebox that plays music when the mouse hovers over each button. And each button has its own weekly response
